exercises.name: Neck Flexion (Bodyweight)
exercises.description: Melatih otot leher bagian depan dengan berat tubuh.

exercises.name: Side Neck Flexion
instructions: Kembali ke tengah, lalu ganti sisi.

exercises.name: Neck Isometric Hold (Front)
exercises.description: Menahan tekanan di bagian depan leher.
instructions: Dorong kepala ke depan sambil menahan dengan tangan.

exercises.name: Neck Isometric Hold (Back)
exercises.description: Menahan tekanan di bagian belakang leher.
instructions: Dorong kepala ke belakang sambil menahan dengan tangan.

exercises.name: Weighted Neck Flexion
exercises.description: Latihan leher depan dengan beban tambahan.
instructions: Tarik kepala ke depan melawan beban.

exercises.name: Weighted Neck Extension
instructions: Tarik kepala ke belakang melawan beban.

exercises.name: Weighted Side Neck Flexion
instructions: Tarik kepala ke samping melawan beban.

exercises.name: Resistance Band Neck Flexion
exercises.description: Menggunakan resistance band untuk melatih leher depan.
instructions: Tarik kepala ke depan melawan band.

exercises.name: Resistance Band Neck Extension
exercises.description: Menggunakan resistance band untuk melatih leher belakang.
instructions: Dorong kepala ke belakang melawan band.

exercises.name: Resistance Band Side Neck Flexion
exercises.description: Menggunakan resistance band untuk leher samping.

exercises.name: Neck Bridge (Wrestler Bridge)
instructions: Angkat pinggul dan letakkan beban di kepala bagian belakang.

exercises.name: Front Neck Bridge
exercises.description: Variasi neck bridge untuk otot depan leher.
instructions: Letakkan kepala di lantai dan dorong tubuh dengan leher.

exercises.name: Shrug with Neck Focus
exercises.description: Shrug ringan dengan fokus aktivasi leher.
